attributes.action: Make Social and Care workers crimanally responsible for thier actions or neglect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a private landlord or a director of a company causes the death of person or people through thier action or inaction, they are crimanally responsible and can face imprisonment for manslaughter. Should it not also be the same for public sector workers. For example in the case of Jessica Randell who died aged 54 days due to the abuse she recieved, yet not one of the services that were meant to protect her have been held accountable.

rejection.details: Such matters are handled by the police on an individual basis.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
